Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

mockthat 0.2.8

  • Remove some tests: due to an internal change in jsonlite, this is no longer a useful example.

mockthat 0.2.7

  • Bugfix.

mockthat 0.2.62021-04-23

  • Fix return objects with length > 1

mockthat 0.2.5

  • Fix mocking imported functions

mockthat 0.2.42020-12-09

  • CRAN re-submission now with minor fix of hard-coding base pkg names as returned by tools:::.get_standard_package_names()$base instead of calling utils::installed.packages().

mockthat 0.2.3

  • save multiple calls and associated args

mockthat 0.2.2

  • CRAN re-submission now with mocktest tests being dependent on availability of mocktest

mockthat 0.2.1

  • add arg argument to mock_args()

mockthat 0.2.0

  • add local_mock() and arg/call caching

mockthat 0.1.1

  • Submitted to CRAN

mockthat 0.1.0

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.
